Welcome to snake and ladders! 

Some background information about the game: it is an ancient Indian board game regarded today as a worldwide classic. It is played between two or more players on a gameboard having numbered, gridded squares. A number of ladders and snakes are pictured on the board, each connecting two specific board squares. The game is a simple race based on sheer luck, and is popular with young children. 

 How to play: press roll and the die will automatically will role and your character will move accordingly. 

Win condition : reach the top left square of the board.
